mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) co FROM EMI_RESOURCE_MODEL a

SELECT a.object_id , b.object_nm , b.instances as object_instances , b.mandatory as object_mandaytory , a.resource_id , a.resource_nm , a.operation , a.instances , a.mandatory , a.data_type , a.range , a.unit , a.descr , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt}') as reg_dt , a.update_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt}') as update_dt FROM EMI_RESOURCE_MODEL a INNER JOIN EMI_OBJECT_MODEL b ON (a.object_id = b.object_id)

SELECT a.object_id , b.object_nm , a.resource_id , a.resource_nm , a.operation , a.instances , a.mandatory , a.data_type , a.range , a.unit , a.descr , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt}') as reg_dt , a.update_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.update_dt,'${prop.dt}') as update_dt FROM EMI_RESOURCE_MODEL a INNER JOIN EMI_OBJECT_MODEL b ON (a.object_id = b.object_id) WHERE a.object_id = #{object_id} AND a.resource_id = #{resource_id}
